thread.title: Catch the Premiere of 'RISE' on VICELAND
thread.title_full: Catch the Premiere of 'RISE' on VICELAND

author: VICE Staff
title: Catch the Premiere of 'RISE' on VICELAND
text:
Catch the Premiere of 'RISE' on VICELAND Our new series documents the various indigenous communities across the Americas fighting colonization. 
In our new VICELAND series RISE , we travel to different indigenous communities across the Americas to meet the people protecting their homelands and rising up against colonization. Catch the premiere episode tonight on VICELAND.RISE airs Fridays at 9 PM. Want to know if you get VICELAND? Head here to find out how to tune in.
